environment_variables.description: [Map] Google Map API key
environment_variables.name: MT_GOOGLE_MAP_KEY

environment_variables.description: [Image.gemini] Gemini Image Api key
environment_variables.name: MT_GEMINI_IMAGE_KEY

environment_variables.description: [Image.gemini] Number of retries when generating Gemini images Default: 0
environment_variables.name: MT_MAX_RETRY_GEMINI

environment_variables.description: [Image.gemini] Character reference image uri (file:// or https://) when generating Gemini image. Multiple settings can be made by separating them with the '|'. When multiple settings are made, they will be selected randomly.
environment_variables.name: MT_AVATAR_IMAGE_URI

environment_variables.description: [Map.etc] Optional: Map API custom endpoint. Example: direction=https://xxxx,places=https://yyyy
environment_variables.name: MT_MAP_API_URL

environment_variables.description: [Map] Optional:Scale of travel time on real roads duration. default 4
environment_variables.name: MT_TIME_SCALE

environment_variables.description: [db.local] db save path: e.g. %USERPROFILE%/Desktop/traveler.sqlite ,$HOME/traveler.sqlite
environment_variables.name: MT_SQLITE_PATH

environment_variables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API URL
environment_variables.name: MT_TURSO_URL

environment_variables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API access token
environment_variables.name: MT_TURSO_TOKEN

environment_variables.description: [rembg.local] absolute path of the installed rembg cli
environment_variables.name: MT_REMBG_PATH

environment_variables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API URL
environment_variables.name: MT_REMBG_URL

environment_variables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API key
environment_variables.name: MT_REMBG_WO_KEY

environment_variables.description: [Image.pixAi] pixAi API key
environment_variables.name: MT_PIXAI_KEY

environment_variables.description: [Image.sd] Stability.ai image generation API key
environment_variables.name: MT_SD_KEY

environment_variables.description: [Image.pixAi] Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124
environment_variables.name: MT_PIXAI_MODEL_ID

environment_variables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188
environment_variables.name: MT_COMFY_URL

environment_variables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json
environment_variables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I

environment_variables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json
environment_variables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I

environment_variables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API
environment_variables.name: MT_COMFY_PARAMS

environment_variables.description: [Image] Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.
environment_variables.name: MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT

environment_variables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042
environment_variables.name: MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO

environment_variables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3
environment_variables.name: MT_BODY_HW_RATIO

environment_variables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5
environment_variables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W

environment_variables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75
environment_variables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H

environment_variables.description: [Sns.Bs] Bluesky sns registration address
environment_variables.name: MT_BS_ID

environment_variables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns password
environment_variables.name: MT_BS_PASS

environment_variables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns handle name: e.g. xxxxxxxx.bsky.social
environment_variables.name: MT_BS_HANDLE

environment_variables.description: [etc] Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location
environment_variables.name: MT_FILTER_TOOLS

environment_variables.description: [etc] Option: Specify whether the movement mode is 'realtime' or 'skip'. default realtime
environment_variables.name: MT_MOVE_MODE

environment_variables.description: [Image] Option: Output image width (pixels) Default is 512
environment_variables.name: MT_IMAGE_WIDTH

environment_variables.description: [Image] Options: 'true' = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified
environment_variables.name: MT_NO_IMAGE

environment_variables.description: [Image] Option: 'true' = Output StreetView image as is without avatar superimposition. Not specified = Superimpose avatar image. Default is not specified.
environment_variables.name: MT_NO_AVATAR

environment_variables.description: [Sns] Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler
environment_variables.name: MT_FEED_TAG

environment_variables.description: [Streamable-http] Maximum number of sessions when using Streamable-http
environment_variables.name: MT_MAX_SESSIONS

environment_variables.description: [Streamable-http] Session TTL when using Streamable-http
environment_variables.name: MT_SESSION_TTL_MS

environment_variables.description: [Streamable-http] Service TTL when using Streamable-http
environment_variables.name: MT_SERVICE_TTL_MS
